basic.floral_language:
Lithops pseudotruncatella 
Floriography: cute exquisite, tenacious
Looks like stones, has green to grayish white leaves, very thick and fleshy, marked by brown and red-brown spots, two leaves arranged in opposite directions, unique and lovely. 
Likes sunshine, shade properly under summer strong sunlight, does not have an apparent dormant period, flowers have many colors, white, yellow, or pink, etc.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow flowers, white or pink
basic.color: Leaf color gray white to gray green with colorful stripes

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, half dormant in summer under high temperatures, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Stop water during its decrustation in spring, reduce water in summer, keep soil moist during peak growth in autumn
maintenance.fertilization: Apply once every 10 ten days in autumn, stop in ecdysis time
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
